channel.title: Whonix Gateway nyx Cant Connect to Proxy
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I hope I'm posting this in the correct place and although the issue is coming from NyX (v2.1.0), I wanted to ask for support here just in case any troubleshooting from the software developers led me to changing settings that would interfere with how Whonix Gateway operates. I always have NyX running on my Whonix GW because I find it very useful for monitoring my connection. On the Graph / Log screen this is the error I am getting
< 00:29:39 WARN Proxy Client: unable to connect OR connection (handshaking (proxy)) with 192.95.36.142:443 ID=none RSA_ID=CDF2E852BF539B82BD10E27E9115A31734E378C2 ( general SOCKS server failure ) >
< 01:18:34 WARN Socks version 71 not recognized. (This port is not an HTTP proxy; did you want to use HTTPTunnelPort?) 00:32:21 WARN Proxy Client: unable to connect OR connection (handshaking (proxy)) with 37.218.240.34:40035 ID=none RSA_ID=88CD36D45A35271963EF82E511C8827A24730913 (general SOCKS server failure) >
Can anyone tell me is this anything I should be worried about, what the error means and / or how to fix it. If you need more info please do ask. I'm a newbie here so I do apologize if I've posted this incorrrectly or not given enough information. I'm using Whonix Gateway and Workstation Virtualbox 6.1.22 Host: Windows 10 Pro

item.title: Whonix Gateway nyx Cant Connect to Proxy
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Whonix Gateway nyx Cant Connect to Proxy

item.title: Whonix Gateway nyx Cant Connect to Proxy
item.dc:creator: Perrosompopo
item.description:
Hi everyone,
I hope I’m posting this in the correct place and although the issue is coming from NyX (v2.1.0), I wanted to ask for support here just in case any troubleshooting from the software developers led me to changing settings that would interfere with how Whonix Gateway operates. I always have NyX running on my Whonix GW because I find it very useful for monitoring my connection.
On the Graph / Log screen this is the error I am getting

< 00:29:39 WARN Proxy Client: unable to connect OR connection (handshaking (proxy)) with 192.95.36.142:443 ID=none
RSA_ID=CDF2E852BF539B82BD10E27E9115A31734E378C2 ( general SOCKS server failure ) >

< 01:18:34 WARN Socks version 71 not recognized. (This port is not an HTTP proxy; did you want to use HTTPTunnelPort?)
00:32:21 WARN Proxy Client: unable to connect OR connection (handshaking (proxy)) with 37.218.240.34:40035 ID=none
RSA_ID=88CD36D45A35271963EF82E511C8827A24730913 (general SOCKS server failure) >

Can anyone tell me is this anything I should be worried about, what the error means and / or how to fix it. If you need more info please do ask. I’m a newbie here so I do apologize if I’ve posted this incorrrectly or not given enough information. I’m using Whonix Gateway and Workstation Virtualbox 6.1.22 Host: Windows 10 Pro
